exceptions.exn: No such bound variable y (no bound variables at all in the expression).

original: intros x. apply filterlim_plus with (y := opp x). apply filterlim_switch_dom. apply locally_le_locally_norm. intros P HP. exists (opp (fun e : posreal => P (scal (opp one) e))). split. apply opp_opp. auto. apply filterlim_plus with (y := x). apply filterlim_switch_dom. apply locally_norm_le_locally. intros P HP. exists (fun e : posreal => P (scal one e)). split. apply opp_opp. auto.
